attributes.title: This is very much NOT adequate!! 😡😡
attributes.userName: IT IZZ NOT WHAT IT IZZ
attributes.review: If i could leave less than a star, I would. The racist xenophobe we have called our president is attempting to take down the social media platform we all know and love as tik tok. This is an outrage. Cancelled.

attributes.title: Had to get a new phone😡
attributes.review: I do NOT recommend getting this app!😡 I was  walking down the street when I got a notification from this app and the man behind me saw it and started HARASSING ME! The man broke my phone.😡 very dissapointed!!

attributes.title: I’m disgusted
attributes.review: This app was absolutely horrible. I have never used something so unnerving and unnecessary. This should be taken down. As a proud member of the U.S I need this taken down. I am entitled to this being taken down.

Out president is stupid, rude, a lair, is racist, and so much more. He doesn’t belong in office or in the world at all. Our president should go back to being irrelevant and not in charge of places. He doesn’t deserve to live! He’s not even human he’s an orange.

attributes.title: I saw an orange man as soon as I got in this app
attributes.review: As soon as I got in this app I saw a burnt chicken nugget and also a small orange that I believe is his son! Definitely this is the worst app in this world! Let’s get this app down! Since they want tiktok down!

attributes.title: Horrifying 😣🤬
attributes.review: I opened the app and logged in hoping to see fellow bernie supporters (bc I am stupid) but instead I saw a orange ,racist, homophobic ,Cheeto and people that like the app that are rocks I collapsed trying to grasp for air as I couldn’t handle seeing the Cheetos weird haircut and face, DO NOT DOWNLOAD WILL HACK PHONE INFO😳😳

attributes.title: Way to sexual 😬🕺
attributes.review: I’m surprised this app is allowed for 17 year olds. Many nudes are displayed all over the menu page and the navigation is terrible. I’ll click a tab and it takes me to pornhub!!!????? What the frigg App Store eyuucky

attributes.title: It’s unacceptable
attributes.review: I literately open the app and the first thing I saw was an unpleasant photo of something then it’s started glitching out and never load it it just has a Very bad photo of something not good

attributes.title: OF U HAVE PETS DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.userName: the manny wil not b televisied
attributes.review: I was just tryin to see my fav moldy Cheeto 🎃but as soon as I opened it a conservative spirt came out of my phone and possessed my cat🙀 now he won’t stop singing god bless America. I highly do not recommend if u have any pets. Plz send help if u know how to reverse. Thx🧚‍♀️🌸💫

attributes.title: Make this app go away again
attributes.review: This is such an offensive app. Not great at all and honestly it couldn’t ever be a ten. I’m extremely offended and want this app gone. Sacrificing this app instead of tik tok, boo on this app. Remove it at once.
